name: NEMO's adventure
description:
(this is a Library of Ruina fangame and it is in no way affiliated with Project Moon) 

This game contains spoilers fo Library of Ruina the SotC chapter.

Made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam 3 in a week with the theme "Less is more".

Summary

You play as Nemo, the director of cane office, and are tasked with eliminating important stars of the city. 

Controls

Left/Right Arrows - move Left/Right

z - attack/select

x - jump

esc - return to main menu;

Down Arrow + z - blocking

Up Arrow + z - special attacks.

The special attacks require charges that you get for blocking and there is one for 5 charges and for 10. Charges can help you with dealing damage but they can also hinder you, the more charges you have the faster you move and if you have more then 10 you lose all of them and you get temporary stunned. Some attacks can not be blocked.
